maqras.text: 84|1|yakhana akasa bidirna habe [1]
84|2|ara tara rabera adesa palana karabe ebam eta'i tara karaniya [1].
84|3|Ara yakhana yaminake samprasarita kara habe [1].
84|4|Ara yamina tara abhyantare ya ache ta ba'ire niksepa karabe o sun'yagarbha habe [1]
84|5|ebam tara rabera adesa palana karabe eta'i tara karaniya [1].
84|6|He manusa! Tumi tomara rabera kache paucha paryanta kathora parisrama karate habe, atahpara tumi tamra saksata labha karabe [1].
84|7|Atahpara yake tara ‘amalanama tara dana hate deya habe
84|8|tara hiseba-nikesa sahaje'i neya habe [1]
84|9|ebam se tara sbajanadera kache [1] praphullacitte phire yabe
84|10|ara yake tara ‘amalanama tara pithera pichanadika theke deya habe
84|11|se abasya'i tara dhbansa dakabe
84|12|ebam jbalanta agune dagdha habe
84|13|niscaya se tara sbajanadera madhye anande chila
84|14|Se to bhabate ye, se kakhane'i phire yabe na [1]
84|15|hyam, [1] niscaya tara raba tara upara samyaka drsti danakari.
84|16|Atahpara ami sapatha karachi [1] pascima akasera
84|17|ara sapatha ratera ebam ta ya kichura samabesa ghataya tara
84|18|ebam sapatha camdera, yakhana ta purna haya
84|19|abasya'i tomara eka stara theke an'ya stare arohana karabe [1].
84|20|Atahpara tadera ki hala ye, tara imana ane na
84|21|ara yakhana tadera kache kura'ana patha kara haya takhana tara sajda kare na [1]
84|22|baram kaphirara mithyaropa kare.
84|23|Ara tara ya posana kare allah ta sabisesa abagata.
84|24|Kaje'i apani taderake yantranadayaka sastira sambada dina
84|25|kintu yara imana ane o satkaja kare tadera jan'ya rayeche nirabacchinna puraskara.
85|1|Sapatha burujabisista [1] asamanera
85|2|ara pratisruta dinera
85|3|ebam drasta o drstera [1]
85|4|abhisapta hayechila [1] kundera adhipatira--- [2]
85|5|ye kunde chila indhanapurna aguna
85|6|yakhana tara era pase upabista chila
85|7|ebam tara muminadera sathe ya karachila ta pratyaksa karachila.
85|8|Ara tara taderake niryatana karechila sudhu e karane ye, tara imana enechila parakramasali o prasansara yogya allahara upara
85|9|asamanamuha o yaminera sarbamaya kartrtba yamra; ara allah sabakichura pratyaksadarsi.
85|10|Niscaya yara mumina nara-narike bipadapanna kareche [1] tarapara ta'oba kareni [2] tadera jan'ya ache jahannamera sasti, ara tadera jan'ya ache dahana yantrana [3].
85|11|Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche jannata, yara padadese nadi prabahita; eta'i mahasaphalya.
85|12|Niscaya apanara rabera pakara'o bara'i kathina.
85|13|Tini'i astitba dana karena o punarabartana ghatana
85|14|ebam tini ksamasila, atisnehamaya [1]
85|15|arasera adhikari o sam'manita.
85|16|Tini ya icche ta-i karena [1].
85|17|Apanara kache ki paumcheche sain'yabahinira brttanta
85|18|phira‘a'una o samudera
85|19|tabu kaphirara mithyaropa karaya rata
85|20|Ara allah sabadika theke taderake paribestana kare rayechena.
85|21|Bastuta eta sam'manita kura'ana
85|22|sanraksita phalake lipibad'dha.
86|1|Sapatha asamanera ebam rate ya abirbhuta haya tara
86|2|ara kise apanake janabe ‘rate ya abirbhuta haya’ ta ki
86|3|ujjbala naksatra [1].
86|4|Pratyeka jibera upara'i tattbabadhayaka rayeche [1].
86|5|Ata'eba, manusa yena cinta kare dekhe take ki theke srsti kara hayeche [1]
86|6|take srsti kara hayeche sabege sthalita pani hate [1]
86|7|eta nirgata haya merudanda o panjarasthira madhya theke [1].
86|8|Niscaya tini take phiriye anate saksama [1].
86|9|Yedina gopana bisaya pariksita habe [1]
86|10|sedina tara kono samarthya thakabe na ebam sahayyakari'o naya.
86|11|Sapatha asamanera, ya dharana kare brsti [1]
86|12|ebam sapatha yaminera, ya bidirna haya [1]
86|13|niscaya ala-kura'ana mimansakari bani.
86|14|Ebam eta nirarthaka naya [1].
86|15|Tara bhisana sarayantra kare [1]
86|16|ebam ami'o bhisana kausala kari [1].
86|17|Ata'eba, kaphiraderake abakasa dina; taderake abakasa dina kichu kalera jan'ya [1].
